item.title: Custom Connector To Connect Graph API In PowerApps
item.author: Kunj Sangani
item.description: Introduction PowerApps is a platform where we can build no code or less code application. This tool is available with Microsoft 365 suit and is very powerful in terms of application development with lots of functions available as per your needs. But in most cases, when we create a custom application, we would like to connect to the different data sources. One of those data sources for Microsoft 365 is Graph API.
